content:
I’m an undergraduate student at the Department of Electrical Engineering, National Taiwan University. My research spanned areas in computational linguistics, signal processing, and computer vision, under the supervision of Prof. Lin-shan Lee (NTU EE/CSIE), Prof. Hung-yi Lee (NTU EE), and Prof. Yu-chiang Frank Wang (NTU EE).
I am also an artificial intelligence intern in DeepHow, the first AI company bridging the skills gap in manufacturing, service and repair through an AI-powered knowledge capturing and training platform based on smart how-to videos. I am responsible for the AI algorithm development, which has been deployed to more than 40 Siemens service centers worldwide.
summary:
I’m an undergraduate student at the Department of Electrical Engineering, National Taiwan University. My research spanned areas in computational linguistics, signal processing, and computer vision, under the supervision of Prof. Lin-shan Lee (NTU EE/CSIE), Prof. Hung-yi Lee (NTU EE), and Prof. Yu-chiang Frank Wang (NTU EE).
I am also an artificial intelligence intern in DeepHow, the first AI company bridging the skills gap in manufacturing, service and repair through an AI-powered knowledge capturing and training platform based on smart how-to videos.
title: Feng-Guang Su

summary: This is the implementation of circuit simplication simplification. By means of unused gate sweeping, trivial optimization, simplification by structural hash, and previous simulation, I try to preliminarily simplify the circuits in an efficient manner. After that, I also apply Equivalence gate merging to the circuits using Boolean Satisfiability (SAT) solver. I collected functionally equivalent candidates (FEC) by circuit simulation. Each simulation can split different FEC into groups. However, the number of simulation times was crucial for the performance. Therefore, I dynamically adjusted the stopping criteria of the simulation according to the splitting times of FEC.
title: Functionally Reduced And-Inverter Graph (FRAIG) <small><small><small>[C++]</small></small></small>

summary: Pokecan is a trash can that can automatically detect the level of trash inside itself, and if it is full, it will walk along the path that is set by user and will dump the trash into a larger trash can. After it dumps all trash out, the Pokecan will walk back to its original location.
title: PokeCan <small><small><small>[rpi][C++][Python][Node.js]</small></small></small>

summary: We compare two schema, the Multilabel-Binary Vectors (MBV) au-toencoder and the Vector Quantized Variational Autoencoder (VQVAE), in which discrete representations of subword units could be discovered from speech without any text label, phoneme label and alignment. By combining the methods, we aim to utilize their strengths and achieve a better performance in the ZeroSpeech2019 Challenge, in terms of either bitrate or quality.
title: TTS Without T <small><small><small>[Pytorch]</small></small></small>

summary: To generate the disparity map given the left and right images, we utilize learning-based method and our understanding of stereo geometry. By training an end-to-end model, it can generate the disparity map only with two images.
title: Depth Map Generation <small><small><small>[pytorch]</small></small></small>

summary: As STO (Security Token Offering) is gaining more and more attention, we consider that the concept can be applied to the real- estate transactions. Meanwhile, by introducing the consortium blockchain, the mechanism brings lots of advantages to the market.
title: Housing Agency System <small><small><small>[Python]</small></small></small>

summary: Imagine that you are busy cooking a great dinner for your party, and your friend is arriving at your house. Your friend pushes the bell, but you can't open the door with the dirty hands! Now the Door Friend comes to save your day. It can recognize you and your friends' faces and voices and open the door.
title: Door Friend <small><small><small>[Rpi][Arduino][Python]</small></small></small>

summary: It is an internet teaching platform that can assist the teaching system, such as taking real-time notes, asking questions, and updating handout. Deployed on https://fashion-ceiba.herokuapp.com/login .
title: Fashion Ceiba <small><small><small>[html][node.js][graphql][react.js][mongo]</small></small></small>

summary: Accepted in Interspeech. Graz, Austria. September 2019.
title: Personalized Dialogue Response Generation Learned from Monologues
